name: Coldwheels
description:
Coldwheels is a 3D slot car racing game inspired by the futuristic look of Tron Legacy. Players can compete with their friends in local multiplayer races on challenging racing circuits, ever at risk of speeding off the tracks.

Specs

Genre: Racing
Engine: Unity 
Players: 2-4
Controls: Xbox controller or keyboard
Platform: PC

Team Frantic

Game Design/ VFX: Luna Tiefensee
Programming: Enrico Ludwig, Louis-Leonid Schreiber
Art Direction / GUI: Carolin Mallwitz
Vehicle Art / Environment Art: Bao Chau Nguyen
Environment Art: Sebastian Wisnia
Production: Nicolas Streule
Audio: Jan Haak

Background

Coldwheels was created as a semester project at Games Academy, Berlin. The uploaded game is the goldmaster version, as shown for our final presentation. The scope is that of a demo or extended prototype, with three playable tracks.

Please note that we're no longer actively working on this project. Given enough interest, we might be able to upload an update to fix some issues. For now, the development is on hold.

Known Bugs & Issues

Pause-Menu

The pause-menu can be opened, but not closed. We recommend not pressing the start-button while playing, as the menu-text will distract from playing. 

Joining the Game

Coldwheels doesn't have a singleplayer-mode - you need at least 2 players. When you reach this screen & want to play with 3 or 4 players, quickly press the A-button, as the race will start soon after the first 2 players have joined.
